channel.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
channel.description:
Read this thread for information: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509088.0.html
This is the song I have chosen to put together first:
[b][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wsdy_rct6uo&ob=av3e]Two Princes - Spin Doctors[/url][/b]
Next songs to be done (if we are any good):
Nothing else matters - Metallica Master of puppets - Metallica Cannon in D - Pachelbell (various artists and versions aswell) MORE IDEAS FROM BAND MEMBERS
Guitar - Acrodox Drums - blakeman8192 Bass - Spot Open Piano (optional) - Spot open Singer - Spot Open
Apply here
[quote] Instrument* - Experience* - Videos/Media - Anything else -

item.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:41, topic:408331”]I can play cello (played for one year jsut to learn bass clef, its gay though, quiting saved my reputation)

Also, my alltime favorite band is Van Halen. I was wondering if you were ok with doing any of thier songs, Eddie is one badass mother fucker, but I can play some of his music :P[/quote]
Can you do eruption?

Read full topic

item.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:35, topic:408331”]Ooh I can do Hotel California
Lets do that :D[/quote]

I can play pretty much all of it but my guitar setup isn’t the nicest so I’m not so sure how well it would sound, but then again there are 2 fill and 2 solo guitars which play at the same time so if one sounds better than the other then you can make the worse one quieter. I would enjoy playing the intro but I don’t have a 12 string acoustic
All together there are 10 instruments playing which is pretty awesome!

Read full topic

item.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I’m a shit guitarist despite playing for like 4 years.
Needs moar Pink Floyd - Comfortably Numb and The Eagles - Hotel California. Both not insanly difficult, but still a challenge and fun to play (well from the guitar perspective I;m talking about)

Since you are all metallica fanboys why not play “One”?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Granite I never tried to learn the other 7 minutes of the song. I decided I wanted to tap, so I learned the tapping part from eruption. Sounds sick with a bit of reverb and delay.

item.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:27, topic:408331”]Nothing else matters - yes
Its an easy song
Master of Puppets is the complete opposite, I can only play the opening 30 seconds or so.

And there is rhythm and lead guitar. So which one are you?[/quote]Um both are really easy songs… Try something fun and challenging instead, like: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=bEs1AWf1eHs#t=151s

Granted, it’s easy up until the solo, but that’s what makes it really shine!

Read full topic

item.title: Continuation Of Song Idea : Getting Down to Business
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

LilXCj:

Remember, not all songs use just one guitar. You should recruit someone else who specializes in different styles of guitar picking so the process can be sped up.

I know but for now Im focusing on only 1 instrument each, so I get the hang of putting the music together

Read full topic
